data.text:
Jason Richardson has been with Service Logic since 2015 and was named Chief Strategy Officer in 2024.

In this role, Jason oversees operations, sales, and information technology. He has held various positions within the organization including Vice President of Finance and Corporate Controller. In his previous roles, Jason had a wide range of responsibilities covering all aspects of the finance function at both the Corporate level and throughout our network of business units. He has a track record for being a hands-on leader that can drive transformation throughout the entire organization.

Jason has been a proven business leader for over 15 years. Before joining Service Logic, he served in various roles at Nucor and Time Warner Cable. Jason began his career in public accounting with PwC in Charlotte, North Carolina.

Jason holds a CPA license and received a bachelor’s degree in accounting and international business from the University of South Carolina.
